title: (x) Revolution straight-sided compressed gothic - Knockout Series C {Tiff}
content:
need to match this... please help.  
i know it is not garamond, bembo or didot :)  
help if you can

j

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108204757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/revo_6435.jpg)
author: Moore

comments.content: [Knockout Series C No. 46 Flyweight](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108204757/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko46.html) also from Hoefler & Frere-Jones
I knew it was from H&FJ :^/

<cite>"i know it is not garamond, bembo or didot"</cite>

Alert the media :) !

knockout for sure... i just wasnt sure cause the curve on the serif of terminal/foot on the "R" changes with different weights...  
while we are all at it i need help with this too

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108204757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/num2_3546.jpg)

the garamond things was a joke... seriously.

ok...

helvetica neue bold

i suck at this

\> _I suck at this._

Hey, don't be so hard on yourself. You know, everybody sucks at _some_thing. We just happen to _not_ suck at identifying type. ;^)
Or maybe we suck at having a sense of humor...
